languages.text: "Какая же страшная участь... быть преданным своими же братьями".
"What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."
languages.original_text: "Какая же страшная участь... быть преданным своими же братьями".

traits.locale_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by your own brethren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “多么可怕的命运啊……被自己的同伴背叛。”
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."

traits.locale_text: “多么可怕的命运啊……被自己的同伴背叛。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Qué destino tan horrible... sufrir la traición de los tuyos».
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."

traits.locale_text: «Qué destino tan horrible... sufrir la traición de los tuyos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「残酷な運命だな…自分自身に裏切られるとは」
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."

traits.locale_text: 「残酷な運命だな…自分自身に裏切られるとは」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Was für ein schreckliches Schicksal ... verraten von den eigenen Leuten."
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein schreckliches Schicksal ... verraten von den eigenen Leuten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Être trahi par les siens... Quel destin horrible. »
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."

traits.locale_text: « Être trahi par les siens... Quel destin horrible. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne korkunç bir kader... Yoldaşlarının ihanetine uğramak..."
languages.original_text: "What a horrible fate... to be betrayed by one's own."
